Package de.crawcial.web.auth

This package contains classes for the authentication processes of Crawcial.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthHelper
    This class contains static helper methods to verify the session and get the session cookie.
    AuthServlet
    This servlet implements the authentication API of Crawcial, that verifies the credentials and redirects the user.
    CrawcialUser
    Objects of this class represent a user and are used as POJOs.
    FbAuth
    This servlet handles the Facebook login process.
    TwAuth
    This servlet handles the Twitter login process.
    UserServlet
    This servlet contains user management activities.

Package de.crawcial.web.auth Description

This package contains classes for the authentication processes of Crawcial.
Author:
Sebastian Lauber
